Title: Under Suspicion
Writer: John Wainwright (book), Claude Miller, Jean Herman, Michel Audiard, Tom Provost (screenplay), W. Peter Iliff (screenplay)
Actors: Gene Hackman, Morgan Freeman, Thomas Jane, Monica Bellucci
Plot: A wealthy attorney i San Juan, PR, comes to the police station for "10 min." of follow up questions to finding a 12 y.o. girl's body in a park. Another 12 y.o. girl was also raped and murdered weeks earlier. Evidence points at him. Guilty?
